original_text: But he who had received the one talent went and dug in the ground and hid his master's money.
korean_text: 한 달란트 받은 자는 가서 땅을 파고 그 주인의 돈을 감추어 두었더니

sentences.original_text: But he who had received the one talent
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 한 달란트를 받은 그 사람은

sentences.original_text: went and dug in the ground
